text: Noel James Salekwa (born 29 December 1989) is a Tanzanian Roman Catholic priest. He supports reconciliation theology. Selekwa ia a member of the Congregation of Holy Spirit in Tanzania. Spiritans Remembered C.S.Sp. â€ , https://spiritanmissionaryseminary.com/ He has been an advocate of reconciliation theology in East Africa. He feels that religious tolerance is a key factor in creating national cohesion that is good for peace and the avoidance of violence. He also thinks that the focus of human dignity is to be treated equally regardless of their religion, race, and tribal differences.
